column1: like i realllly want to watch the adventures of sharon and rusty but i don’t feel like going through all the procedural stuff can somebody magically conjure up a supercut for me so i can catch up easy

So we don’t have DVR and I want to live in all the glory that is a 19 hr marathon of Major Crimes so I think I am going to actually get myself into the mode of watching the whole entire marathon from 3am my time to whenever the season 3 premiere episode airs. I make no guarantees that I dozes between some episodes…but I am going to try my hardest to do this. I want to leave my early 20s with no regrets and this sounds like a whole lotta fun.
